node.title: Woman, 19, pleads not guilty to 'headphones' murder of 16yo boy
node.alt: a young boy smiling while sitting on the ground
node.description: Kayla Dawson pleads not guilty to killing shoolboy Jason Galleghan during an August party at her home in Sydney after an alleged dispute over a pair of headphones.
node.content:
["A woman has pleaded not guilty to killing a schoolboy during\u00a0an August\u00a0party at her home in Sydney after an alleged dispute over a pair of headphones.", "Kayla Dawson, 19, chose to remain in her jail cell today when an email was read before Blacktown Local Court, confirming her plea of not guilty to murder.", "Outside court,\u00a0more than 20 protesters gathered peacefully holding placards with photos of Jason Galleghan, who was bashed to death in Doonside.", "He died from severe head injuries in hospital.", "The fight was allegedly over a pair of headphones, with detectives ruling out speculation it was triggered by so-called \"post code\" wars involving rival gangs.", "Jason's mother Rachel Galleghan and aunt\u00a0Katie Abrahams were among the supporters outside court, chanting \"Justice for Jason\".", "\"I don't really have any words, it is indescribable how Jason's mum dealt with this \u2014\u00a0she is incredibly brave \u2014\u00a0she is an inspiration to all of us,\"\u00a0Ms\u00a0Abrahams\u00a0said outside court.", "\"The bravery she shows everyday is just gobsmacking.\"\u00a0", "", "
Kayla Dawson\u00a0has pleaded not guilty over the murder of a 16-year-old boy.(Supplied)
", "Jason's godfather Josh Warner said the family had\u00a0been overwhelmed with support.", "\"It's sickening, it's just a sick feeling and we will be here for justice and that's what we want to see \u2014\u00a0at the end of the day, it needs to be served,\" he said outside court.", "Eleven people \u2014\u00a0including a 15-year-old girl and a 13-year-old boy \u2014\u00a0remain before courts.", "The children allegedly involved cannot be named for legal reasons.\u00a0", "", "
Supporters of Jason Galleghan's family rally outside court.\n\u00a0(ABC News/Mark Reddie)
", "Ms Dawson is accused of organising the attack at her Perigee Close property and allegedly\u00a0previously described the victim as \"a good guy\".", "Her boyfriend, Harley Bartolo, is also expected to face court this month, charged with being an accessory after the fact.", "Ms Dawson was expected to apply for bail today but will instead remain behind bars until the case returns to court on February 25."]
